Constants.Specs: Measurements are from top of floor to underside of the rafter

Conditions.Mandatory: Areas with at least 5' of head clearance count toward the gross floor area

Exceptions.Explicit deviations: 500 sf of unusable attic space may be exempted for Category 1 & 2 historic homes

Conditions.Mandatory: Voluminous spaces contribute to the mass even if not used or described in the floor plan
